issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: fernanda
assignee.emailAddress: fernanda dot pizzorno dot derby at gmail dot com

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Setting property derby.system.bootAll causes an Exception

author.name: fernanda
author.emailAddress: fernanda dot pizzorno dot derby at gmail dot com

comments.body:
The attached patch (derby-1296.diff) fixes the problem and adds a new tests.

I have run derbyall with this patch (the same tests as in http://www.multinet.no/~solberg/public/Apache/Failures/TinderBox_Derby/423768.html failed). Can someone please review it?

updateAuthor.name: fernanda
updateAuthor.emailAddress: fernanda dot pizzorno dot derby at gmail dot com

author.name: andreask
author.emailAddress: andreas dot korneliussen at gmail dot com

comments.body:
Thanks for making the patch for this critical issue. It seems there is a conflict when applying it, due to changes in BaseJDBCTestCase. Could you please resolve the conflict?
I do also suggest renaming the test case class from bootAllTest to BootAllTest.

updateAuthor.name: andreask
updateAuthor.emailAddress: andreas dot korneliussen at gmail dot com

author.name: fernanda
author.emailAddress: fernanda dot pizzorno dot derby at gmail dot com

comments.body: The conflics are resolved and the test is renamed from bootAllTest to BootAllTest in the attached patch (derby-1296v2.diff).

updateAuthor.name: fernanda
updateAuthor.emailAddress: fernanda dot pizzorno dot derby at gmail dot com

author.name: andreask
author.emailAddress: andreas dot korneliussen at gmail dot com

comments.body:
Thanks for resolving the conflict.

Committed revision 425388.

updateAuthor.name: andreask
updateAuthor.emailAddress: andreas dot korneliussen at gmail dot com

author.name: fuzzylogic
author.emailAddress: mcintyre dot a at gmail dot com

comments.body: This issue has been resolved for over a year with no further movement. Closing.

updateAuthor.name: fuzzylogic
